Who is at risk for Osteosarcoma and Malignant Fibrous Histiocytoma of Bone? ?,"Having past treatment with radiation can increase the risk of osteosarcoma. Anything that increases your risk of getting a disease is called a risk factor. Having a risk factor does not mean that you will get cancer; not having risk factors doesnt mean that you will not get cancer. Talk with your
